Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png'}
{3: 'As Chrome begins calling for a transport fleet from Babylonia, Kamui stirs awake.'}
{3: 'Kamui hops and takes on a combat stance in one motion, wielding his greatsword and pointing it at you.'}
{2: "...What's going on?", 3: '8'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Why is my M.I.N.D. projection looking like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...Well, not like it matters. Fighting's all the same.", 4: '1'}
{3: '...Something is not right.'}
{3: 'You have a feeling that this Kamui in front of you is not the Kamui you know.'}
{2: 'Where is Kamui?', 3: '14'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I should be the one asking you.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Where has Kamui gone? Why can't I talk to him?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You must be Camu, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "...You aren't virus embodiments?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu freezes with his greatsword still raised. He seems to have noticed his appearance.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "...What's going on here?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After spacing out shortly, Camu swerves his greatsword, pointing it at you and the others.'}
{2: "It's a long story...", 3: '31'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Then make it short.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "So I'm stuck in this state, because of that Roland?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "And if we don't get this fixed in time, Kamui's consciousness might disappear?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'At least, according to Asimov.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm not going back to Babylonia and letting that gloomy nerd experiment on me. Looks like there's only one choice left.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you going to try and eliminate the culprit?', 3: '42'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "From what you just said, he's a pushover anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'If I can just... j-just...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui—or Camu—trembles and spasms. His greatsword gives a dull thud as it falls on the beach.'}
{3: "Camu's body tenses, as if trying to resist something."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Commandant! Careful!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Like a spring being uncoiled, Camu's body shoots out like an arrow. With his greatsword in hand, he cuts a wide sweep aside."}
{3: 'If it were not for Karenina pushing you to the ground, the blade would have slit your throat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The viral density near Kamui's frame is rising rapidly! He needs emergency buffers, NOW!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '—Asgishjalmur! Asgishjalmur!!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Tsk, looks like he's not listening!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Then we'll have to do it the hard way!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina swings her bazooka to deter the advances of Camu. Using the explosive thrust of the bazooka, she forcefully knocks Camu over and buries him into the soft sand.'}
{3: "Lucia and Lee combine efforts to pin Camu's upper body down before he come to. Camu's flailing limbs send spurts of sand flying."}
{3: "Seeing an opening, Liv hurriedly links a primed buffer to the back of Camu's neck."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'M.I.N.D. buffer, at max output!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'What... What happened... just now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I limited your power output to 5% of your original through a buffer. We'll try to figure out a solution before the buffer fails.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "...No. What I want to know is why did I suddenly take control of Kamui's body? And why is this body getting out of control in my hands?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The energy control system in your body isn't functioning properly, likely because the M.I.N.D. of your frame is severed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I can't perform high-precision repairs alone. We might need help from Babylonia...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Once again. Asimov time.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What is it this time? I just went for a coffee break, and you got in trouble, again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Cut the crap, just tell me what to do!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's Kamui? How did he wake up?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's not Kamui that woke up.", 3: '107'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Ah. In that case. Nice to meet you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Let's do away with greetings. Never liked them.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "No, I'm just trying to be nice, because I'll be taking a spin in your M.I.N.D. next...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Yep. Literally.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I have no idea what you're spouting, but you're doing a real good job of pissing me off.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If you find it weird, or have questions, I can give you a short primer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: '...Fine. Guess I can crush that comms terminal after I hear you explain.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "...Okay. Then I'll begin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'As you should already know, the M.I.N.D. is a system designed to maintain human consciousness for Constructs...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'And for some reason, someone added in a set of general-purpose computer I/O terminals to the virtual human brain neural array structure...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Wait. I think I was that very someone. Well, whatever.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In a nutshell, if the M.I.N.D. can't find the corresponding solution in its error library, the GPC part will endlessly try to open a door that doesn't exist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Because it only remembers that door.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Even if you, the owner, have moved away from home, kicked it, or if you're head-banging to heavy metal, it'll still keep looking for you. In short, it'll keep looking for the designated doorway until it finds it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "So what's that gotta do with me?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you're just another average Construct, then it wouldn't matter. But you're not.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Your signals are a hodgepodge, but there are characteristic signals of the Ascension-Network in your Inver-Device echoes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "This means that, though you're not an Ascendant, you're still similar to one.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Based on 【kuroname】\'s description of the situation earlier, I have decided to classify these Ascendant-like beings with special characteristics like you as "Transcendants."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Transcendant?', 3: '149'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Yes, a Transcendant. Because of the Ascendant nature of Camu from what you have described, and the in-between state of them being on the "the other side" of a Construct, but not to the point of being an Ascendant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'For now, all we know is that Camu\'s "transcendence" is the work of Roland. Roland has granted him Ascendant characteristics somehow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Comparing it with previous cases, we can see that Camu's case bears a high degree of similarity to the Kowloong leader Qu.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And, Camu's appearance has essentially confirmed a hypothesis I reached with President Hassen before: There are more Ascendants than the ones that we know of.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'There are likely Ascendants with other purposes in mind, or even Ascendants who are willing to work with us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Ah, I seem to have gone off topic. Let's continue.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Let\'s return to the door metaphor. "Camu", you are the one who moved houses, making the control system in your body unable to find the door home. That is what happened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If you are indeed the Camu from the Kurono data I have, you have transferred the I/O terminal ownership to Kamui in the past to let him take charge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'In other words, your consciousness does not have the authority to access or use most of the terminals on this frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Action module terminals keep no locks—you feed them any signals and they'll move. But your energy-related terminals require additional plug-ins and authentication...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'When the superuser consciousness enters a lockdown for some reason, other consciousnesses can do nothing about the energy system going out of control.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: '...Just tell me the solution.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Return to Babylonia for maintenance and repairs. We'll completely separate you from Kamui and plug your consciousness to another frame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Of course, because of the unknown factor of Tenebrion, even if we separate you from Kamui... We can't guarantee that Kamui will recover.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But this should be able to buy both you and us the necessary time to solve the problem, at least.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '【kuroname】, before you went on your vacation, I remember giving you a special tech prototype...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's a little something I made after getting ideas from the collars on the Nighter. It's essentially a necklace-sized remote connection pod.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "What are you waiting for? Finding it weird that it's so small? Hurry up and whip it out.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Whip out prototype necklace)', 3: '183'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Put it on. Then I'll explain.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...I demand an explanation first.', 3: '185', 4: '(Put on the necklace)', 5: '190'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's pretty much the same thing as from April Fools' Day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But I remade it into a system-on-a-chip, and then had the WGAA make me a shell.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Then I wrote a masking algorithm that reduces the consciousness stress to 0.27% of the original, even with the same power output.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And then some more tech magic, and it's done.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Put on the necklace)', 3: '190'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Okay, caught the signal. Camu, I want you to get as close to 【kuroname】 as you can.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu walks over with a doubtful expression.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Liv, how long can the buffer last?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The effect will start to fade after ten minutes.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'More than enough for me to redirect the gateway.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Okay, beginning access.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'A little warning—it might tickle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory51.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Hm? What's with this visual interface...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Oh. Never mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Camu, your energy output should be back to normal. You can try... Well, try moving around a little.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Oh, forgot about you. It's okay. You're now seeing the visual interpretation of Camu's M.I.N.D.—in other words, Camu's cognition.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Too much trouble rewriting a visual interface for a Transcendant. Camu will be the one doing the fighting anyway, not you. So I redirected your visuals to his M.I.N.D. instead of the frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You'll be fine as long as you have access to the energy modules and tactical authority. Which is why I'm keeping everything simple.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Transcendants might require a completely different system at the root level... It might take some time to create a full set of compatible terminals. The frame will also have to be redesigned the way Nikola intended...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I just tried it out. Everything's going smooth.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...Guess you do know your cogs and gears, eh.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Okay! Then it's sorted. You can stop worrying about the small stuff. I'll provide 【kuroname】 with a signal reference for visual support. You should head towards Roland with the others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I found traces of his signal a little further ahead of you. Looks like he's still keeping a close eye on your condition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "...Let me get this straight—I still don't fully trust you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'But to get Kamui back to normal, I\'ll leave my "half" in your hands for now.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory51.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh my. Who do we have here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Such a bad, bad boy—squirming through the filtering this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Did you know? Most converted Constructs become zealots of hatred and despair, when those emotions are merely amplified by the filtering...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Of course, past that point of no return, it's a fare-thee-well to their souls.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Whatever. Just tell me how to get Kamui back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Heh... As the true master of your mind, is that all you want? How revolting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Did that phantom of a Kamui weave some dream so sweet that you can't pull yourself out of?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm not here to make small talk...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm stuck here in this outdated frame, just to make you spit out what I want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm mad, so prepare to pay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Hahahahaha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Ahahahahahaha!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'My hero, MY! Looks like you truly did escape the "trial" in some way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Humans... and you lesser-than-human thing! You're all the same!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The network chose you! But you always let the network down!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Fine. Come on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Time for a good whipping, my bad, bad boy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'After all, it\'s the teacher responsibility when a vile little rascal doesn\'t grow into a proper, functional "human" being.', 4: '1'}
